snippet: LYDEN--Rose M. The Atlantic Golf Club mourns the passing of member, Rose Marie Lyden. We extend our sincere condolences and heartfelt sympathy to her husband, John, her children, Barry, Tracey, Kevin and Hillary and their families. Dennis A. Suskind, President Harvey L. Radler, Vice President 1/3
lead_paragraph: LYDEN--Rose M. The Atlantic Golf Club mourns the passing of member, Rose Marie Lyden. We extend our sincere condolences and heartfelt sympathy to her husband, John, her children, Barry, Tracey, Kevin and Hillary and their families. Dennis A. Suskind, President Harvey L. Radler, Vice President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LYDEN, ROSE M
